attributes.action: Make the practise of sending people home without pay (Short Shifting) Ilegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Employers especially in the finance sector practise what is known as 'short shifting'. They employ 'Agency' personel who are sent home early and whole shifts cancelled without pay on a regular basis. I call on the government to outlaw this abhorrent practise as soon as possible
